summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Roxbury Heights Addition to the City of Seattle; Gourlay's Half Acre Tracts; Joan C. Hall's Acre Tracts; Spring Hill Villa Tracts; vacated 11th Avenue S.W.; Brighton Beach Acre Tracts; Second Addition, as laid off by the heirs of Sarah A. Bell; Allendale; and Cedar Park No. 2, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
